scripts.build:clean:client: rm -rf client/dist && cp -r server/node_modules/* client/node_modules/ && ls client/node_modules
scripts.prepare:server: npm run install:server && npm run build:clean:server && npm run build:deploy:server
scripts.prepare:client: npm run install:client && npm run build:clean:client && npm run build:deploy:client
scripts.postinstall: npm run prepare:server && npm run prepare:client
